title: Global leading fishing nations 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Capture in million metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The Capture in million metric tons is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
The difference of Capture in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 13.22.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Capture in million metric tons in the y axis.
The Capture in million metric tons is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Capture in million metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The Capture in million metric tons is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
The difference of Capture in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 13.22.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Capture in million metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Capture in million metric tons is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
Second maximum Capture in million metric tons is found at Country Indonesia.
There is a difference of 13.22 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Myanmar.
Capture in million metric tons at Country China is 15.37 , second place is Indonesia at 6.69, and thirdly is India at 5.43.
The Country Myanmar tends to be 2.92 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 52.56.
